item.title: Add a Swagger UI using a .NET 9 Json OpenAPI file
item.description: This post shows how to implement a Swagger UI using a .NET 9 produced OpenAPI file. The Swagger UI is deployed to a secure or development environment and is not deployed to a public production target. Sometimes, it is required to deploy the Swagger UI to a development deployment target and not the test or [â€¦] Link to article: https://damienbod.com/2024/08/12/add-a-swagger-ui-using-a-net-9-json-openapi-file/
